website_summaries.verdict: A quality bookshelf that stands out for its distinctive design.
pros: Its unique and stylish design is one of the stand-out features of this model
Owners report that it is good quality, sturdy, and simple to assemble
We love that it provides a decent amount of space for books or collectibles
cons: A few felt it was slightly unstable
It also tends to have some issues if too much weight is placed on the shelves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A bit intimidated by instruction, but all worked out. It took me less than an hour to put it togheter.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen appliance storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to store kitchen appliances and cookbooks in my dining room. Looks more decorative than a regular bookshelf. I put it together on my own and it took about an hour. I wanted to order another one for our board games but at the time they weren't available. This is a great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Nicole Quale

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and item arrived broken, contacted customer service to replace the 2 borken pieces. Was told beyond warranty so could not return. Only wanted 2 new pieces that were broken in half. Was advised associate would get back to me after checking with manager. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase! It's very sturdy -really don't need to afix it to the wall unless you have children who'd be knocking into it, but I did use one of the hooks for safe measure- and it looks great. The color is perfect with all of my other furniture as well. It was super easy to put together, the instructions are very clear. Also, fast shipping! Came a week early.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Be careful assembling
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it is. Easy to assemble. Pretty sturdy for particle board. I turned mine on its side and i like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: aguitian27

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SHELF!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE OUR SHELF! It's so big and so abstract looking. It will NOT STAND ON ITS OWN, YOU MUST MOUNT TO WALL OR IT WILL BE SEVERELY WOBBLY AND DANGEROUS. but it's easy to do and once secured it is steady as a rock and looks awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Intermixture

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Gift to daughter for her new apartment, she likes things just a little different than the norm so how "interesting" can you get when selecting a bookshelf. I knew she needed one and I thought other than color bookshelves are all the same till I saw this one! This one is different, provides equal space for her books but not as typical or boring as all the standard book shelves. Price is great, its sturdy and a nice quality. I was glad that I can provide a subtle different look for a book shelf to just add to my daughters eclectic style. She was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RERCLR

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but can't hold weight.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a bibliophile like me, you need a bookshelf that can actually hold some books. This is NOT the shelf for you. First off, building it is a pain because of the wonky shelving. Second, the shelf will look just fine until you've had it for two years and you notice how bowed it is in the middle, looking like it wants to give way at any second. I've since taken all my books off of it and use it for lightweight craft supplies. Definitely unique looking for decor but not worth it for an actual bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: 4fromTexas

customer_reviews.title: Very Average
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. A quality bookshelf of this design and size is typically $200. This one is beautiful, but began to bend under the weight of my books immediately. I’m hoping it lasts me the year I’m in my rental, but am not too optimistic. I have large baseboards that make it hard to attach to the wall, so it is super unsteady. I would recommend using the attachment. I read the reviews and thought people were being dramatic, but this shouldn’t be a purchase with the intent of it lasting a long time
customer_reviews.author: Stacie RN

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well, you do indeed get what you pay for. I should have known better so I will be using this until I can find something of better quality with which to replace it. That being said, it was easy to put together if you pay attention to the instructions. I love puzzles and have been putting similar items together for many years so I found it easy if I paid attention. The quality is poor as it is engineered wood with a very thin wood grain veneer. It will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Kinipela

customer_reviews.title: Design is nice but it is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Design is nice but it is not sturdy. It doesn't have a strong base and instead requires that you nail it to your wall from the top. Another problem is that you cannot secure it from the top to the wall if you have molding around your flooring as it will create a divide. Finally, it tips based on the weightiness of books you have on it. Overall the design is nice but its not durable.
customer_reviews.author: sama Chahine

customer_reviews.title: It looks actually pretty good It's not a custom-made shelf or anything like ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave the shelf to my daughter for her birthday present. To help her get her stuff off the floor. She actually put this whole thing together by her self and only took her probably a half an hour. It looks actually pretty good It's not a custom-made shelf or anything like that but for the money it's actually a really nice shelf.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: cool design afforable bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I put this and several other mainstay book shelves together. This one is the most stable/ It could be placed in the middle of the room as it has no unfinished sides. At first the directions look daunting but they are pretty easy to follow. I recommend it being assembled with two adults. took about 45 mins to assemble. I used the wall anchors as I have very plush carpet. Overall a very nice book case and the design is neat
customer_reviews.author: Kitten Under the Tree

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a room divider. My living and dining rooms make an L shape and I wanted something to separate them, as a divider per se. I ordered this and followed the assembly instructions to the letter, even anchored it to the wall via stud. When placing things on the shelves, I placed heavier items on the bottom so as to not make it top heavy. I've not had it even a year, and it is starting to sag in the middle toward the top. I'm not sure how to remedy this, as all the heavy weight is on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: @thedanadeschsmith

customer_reviews.title: Challenging but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The directions are somewhat vague. This piece of furniture is like a puzzle. Each item has to go turned a certain way and in the right place at the right time. I put it together twice before I got it right. There's a chip in one of the front center pieces which is an eye sore and I don't love that it needs to be bolted to the wall but otherwise a nice shelving unit. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bookcase for the price. It's pretty easy to put together, took me about an hour by myself. It's fairly sturdy but should definitely be mounted against the wall. I like how unique it is, it spruced up my study nook quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Wrong holes
customer_reviews.text: This unit was very hard to install. I contacted customer service who add absolutely no value to the issue. The holes were in the wrong place so I had to drill holes in the correct place to complete it. The only option customer service gave was mailing the pieces back at my own expense. I’ll never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on this, and couldn't be happier. I have started to accumulate quite a few books, and wanted a nice way to display and store them. This shelf is fun because it breaks things up and gives lots of places to tuck in little decorative items and objects to add interest. Not only my books, but a reading lamp, various souvenirs, and even my father's ashes are right at home on this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: lildebbiec

customer_reviews.title: Nice Display Shelving
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11yo's playroom in order to organize and display one of her toy collections. It serves that purpose beautifully, gives her better access to each piece, and keeps it all organized rather than thrown into a toy box and not played with because they're all jumbled together in a heap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the more expensive version that I have seen in the furniture store. The wood is not as thick as the one in the store but you could not tell the difference if they are not side by side. It is a great addition to my living space. Not hard to put together, but you need to have enough room. I added the wall hook to stabilize the unit. You could probably do without that part although the directions stress the need to use it. I used it because I collect bottles and have them on the shelves. It is very stable and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K Kae

customer_reviews.title: great shelf and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf! Very sturdy and as described. It does take a few minutes to put together but we had it up and together within 20 min. heavy and durable. Perfect for what I needed it for. comes with a hook to secure it to the wall if needed. Product came much faster than the delivery date given when ordered. I think it said up to two weeks but got in in two or three days.
customer_reviews.author: Jettichicken

customer_reviews.title: Love itttt. I'm not as tool-handy as everyone on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love itttt. I'm not as tool-handy as everyone on these reviews apparently, because it took me a little over an hour and a half to do it alone. Instructions are easy to read. All you need is a phillips head screwdriver. Also I didn't attach it to the wall because I didn't feel like it, but it seems to be holding up fine! I would imagine if you have a kid or a dog or something though, you should probably take the extra step.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: Forget about the directions. Took 2 college grads and a home repair friend to figure this one out! Had to drill out 2 of the pre drilled holes which were too small for the cheaply made “wood “ pegs to fit. If you’re a puzzle genius you might enjoy putting this together. We weren’t. After 2 hours we ended up with a nice looking bookcase. However, it is quite flimsy and very unstable. I would NOT recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Adrie33

customer_reviews.title: Made out of real wood and a great size. I needed to fill a large wall ...
customer_reviews.text: Made out of real wood and a great size. I needed to fill a large wall in my entry way and this filled the space perfectly. I love the funky design and it was easy and fun to personalize it with not just books but also other items. Looks great and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice. We have some games and some collectibles on ...
customer_reviews.text: OK.... It looks nice. We have some games and some collectibles on it. If it had books it would collapse. There is barely any weight on it and its already visibly sagging. Will possibly be adding a back to help sagging but might just get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to sustain heavy books.
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is not for regular book. Maybe magazines, or decorative items. The middle will sink after a while. But it looks nice when newly put together.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust this product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Damage product. Looks like it’s been used. More than 3 pieces has a defect. Literally I rather throw this piece of crap away than go through the hassle of returning.... honestly I should’ve know better than to order big stuff on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Powell

customer_reviews.title: Over time this thing will collapse inward
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this with precision and perfection and over 2 years this thing start going inward. I can't upload a picture but basically if you are a start up company or someone who got their tax refund, it's great to have a a show case for one year. After that it belongs outside human eyesight, it's not pleasing to look at collapsing inward. I have had better luck at Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: apextc

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks, and the assembly instructions were very clear. Took me about half an hour to assemble. The only thing that is bothering me about this bookcase is that I have a hardwood floor, and the bottom of the bookcase has screws. I tried to screw them in as hard as I could so that they are not sticking out to scratch my floor, but they are still popping out a bit. I wish there were some kind of soft stickers included to cover the screw heads.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bookshelf I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about the quality of this bookshelf because it was so inexpensive, but I was pleasantly surprised! The wood is very solid and sturdy, it was pretty easy to put together, only took me about an hour, and really enjoy the quirkiness of the different shapes shelves! It ended up being bigger than I thought, so make sure you check the dimensions and measure.
customer_reviews.author: Thia

customer_reviews.title: Holds a variety of book sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great size, Holds every size of book in my collection. However 4/5 as it can sway from side to side. Did come with a wall attachment clip. Would not want to lean on it as it would most likely break.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Actually love this. After reading the reviews that said it ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually love this. After reading the reviews that said it was easy to put together, I found it actually pretty easy to put together. I drank a few beers and listened to a podcast and all the sudden... BOOM shelving unit. It looks wobbly, but it's very sturdy. I even missed a bit of reinforcemental hardware. Was worried about my cat jumping on it, but I forgot that she's blind. She doesn't jump on anything! My plants LOVE it. We all really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: It's not too expensive but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The center of the shelf sort of cave in when I put heavy objects such as textbooks on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleAndClean

customer_reviews.title: Helping to organize my books
customer_reviews.text: It really useful and it’s Helped me to organize my books and it was really Easy to do the installations
customer_reviews.author: Omarbaashaa

customer_reviews.title: unique & versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I want to give 4, because it is a tad wobbly & might be a little off kilt. However, it gets a 5 because it is so cool! I love how I can change up the look on it if I want and it fits so many books. I'm excitedly happy with this book shelve and love the unique look!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great. My only complaint is that it's a tad wobbly if you lean anything against it. Not that I planned to. Just... doesn't seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maysen Knutson

customer_reviews.title: The shelfs will droop in the middle due to all ...
customer_reviews.text: The shelfs will droop in the middle due to all the weight of the books. It's cheap but it accomplishes the task.
customer_reviews.author: ClubberLang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my bookshelf! I look at it and I am super proud that I put this together by myself. I wouldn't recommend putting it together by yourself if you already have someone to help you... But because I don't, I was able to handle it myself. It looks pretty durable so far... Let's give it a couple of years and some more moves... and we'll see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Stuyles

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf! Adds some visual interest and looks very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bookshelf! Adds some visual interest and looks very expensive without actually being super expensive. It's fun to use the different levels to add unique decorations and section off books.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Wasn't too hard to set up but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Wasn't too hard to set up but I got hung up a couple times. A couple dings on the paint from shipping but other than that it was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accent
customer_reviews.text: I installed this horizontally with other pieces on top. A great way to display my collectibles.
customer_reviews.author: Erika L

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hard to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, hard to put together as expected. Reason for four stars is one of the center bracing shelves didn’t hook together properly. It is a load bearing support column in the center, too. It works, but sags.
customer_reviews.author: Mikka McGee

customer_reviews.title: The box came in pretty beat up and I thought there were some damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: The box came in pretty beat up and I thought there were some damaged pieces initially since there was some particle board that was used for packing but luckily it was just extra packing material. It was really easy to set up, my wife and I had it assembled in less than an hour. We use it to store our board game collection.
customer_reviews.author: Rcj

customer_reviews.title: It was also easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So this definitely isn't the most rock-solid book case, it wiggles a little, but we have a ton of books on it and it holds well. It was also easy to put together. We used it as a room divider in our studio apartment. It's not a keep-sake bookcase. I doubt it will last another move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good though, can't attest to it's strength just yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward construction, although I wish they had been slightly more meticulous with packaging, since one of the panels had a noticeable scratch on it. Looks good though, can't attest to it's strength just yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Moops

customer_reviews.title: this is a great book case
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great book case. It looks exactly as pictured. Putting it together requires space, time, and patience, but was not difficult. Very pleased, but not worth much more than listed price.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Tamburri

customer_reviews.title: Super difficult  instructions but worth it 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not the easiest to understand! I tried putting this thing together and had to take it right back apart so many times 😔! But when I FINALLY understood what I was doing It was smooth sailing. It could’ve been a little more sturdier but overall it looks amazing and I can’t wait to decorate it!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, both color and durability
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks great, both color and durability. Cons: Package was extremely heavy and damaged. Many shelves were chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo easy to assemble. Just simply separate all pieces into groups, follow instructions on diagram, and done. Super unique and cute and holds sturdy. Ads so much personality. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very doable by one person
customer_reviews.text: While you might need some help moving the box, once it's unpacked it's easy to essamble by one person. I did it a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Houk

customer_reviews.title: They're a gorgeous addition to my craft room. I ...
customer_reviews.text: They're a gorgeous addition to my craft room. I can store all kinds of odd-sized items so I can find everything. Things are organized and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Use  carefully
customer_reviews.text: Good buy but definitely not meant for use as a bookcase with real books
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Saggy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bookshelf. But it sags. I’m not sure how else to describe it. I’ve had it in my home for over a year now and it hasn’t fallen over yet but it’s saggy. The middle bows in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. It's cute and sturdy. I assembled it myself so that says a lot since I am not very good with directions. It looks nice on my living room and holds a lot of books, plush animals, pictures and other decor.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well, does take a time to put together
customer_reviews.author: BJones

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Was a pain in the ass to put together and had no extra parts, but looks really nice and is a good book case
customer_reviews.author: PrincessPandora7

customer_reviews.title: ... skills) in about 45 minutes and thought it was pretty easy! Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it alone (with no impressive building skills) in about 45 minutes and thought it was pretty easy! Seems sturdy. Be aware that they do ask you to fix it to a wall
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and great quality....shortly after this arrived my husband was diagnosed with terminal cancer....so that is why I didn't write about the bookcase sooner but I was very happy with it....another gift for my daughter and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a decent bookshelf. The instructions were good and I put it together myself in no time. It seems pretty sturdy and will work for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Turned out well aligned and sturdy, we have it against the wall and its ...
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf taught me that you will never truly know someone until you assemble furniture together. Once it was understood that the directions are not a suggestion but rather, something more akin to the infallible word of God - things went much more smoothly. Turned out well aligned and sturdy,we have it against the wall and its not attached and I am in no way afraid of it falling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Unique bookcase and pretty much what I expected for the price. It's not fine furniture but it's sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cool shape and affordable, but very unsturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price and I love the unique shape that enables easy display. That said, it's quite flimsy and unsturdy. You definitely want to anchor this to a wall in case it collapses on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: but the product had all pieces required and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to assemble, and there were a few pieces that werent in the instructions, but the product had all pieces required and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Rhenjamin

customer_reviews.title: Not for books
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the manual in regards to weight limit on the shelves considering the decorative way the shelves are placed. We must have overloaded the shelves. There is a noticeable sag in the upper shelves.
customer_reviews.author: nikkisprite

customer_reviews.title: This is a gorgeous bookshelf. Even after lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous bookshelf. Even after lots of tightening, it is still a little shaky (probably due to the stylish lack of a back).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and holds a good amount of weight.
customer_reviews.text: I think its a good price for the product but it did take some time to build. Once you finish building it it looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphinbull11

customer_reviews.title: Would have given it a five but two screws were ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a five but two screws were missing, i could have called but it wasn't that detremental i just flipped the bookshelf over to make the top the bottom
customer_reviews.author: donna eb

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are easy to understand. Took about an hour to put together. I love it!! Color is great and matched my current furniture. It came in the mail within the week that I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months the shelves started to sage down from the center especially the top one. Now it looks really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Borhan E.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I sent it as a gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Dean D.

customer_reviews.title: ... not hold up saging in the middle looks really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up saging in the middle looks really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Damaged..bought New
customer_reviews.text: I bet this item would be great. It took over a week to get here. I was happy when it came. Only to find out it was totally damaged on the way. I hope I can get another one delivered asap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie and Jason Niesing

customer_reviews.title: One arrived damaged. The wood bows once you have ...
customer_reviews.text: One arrived damaged. The wood bows once you have books on the shelf. Worsens over a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use these as bookshelves. And of course they’re inexpensive and not real wood, but noticeable dipping in the shelves just after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Silina

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of furniture. It looks great and is solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother last March for his birthday. He loved it so much he bought another one to sit right beside it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bookshelf, but make sure you have a drill!
customer_reviews.text: YOU NEED A POWER DRILL TO BUILD THIS! They imply that you don't, but you do. Otherwise, it was quick to build and has held up pretty nicely so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The design is cool but not stable at all when I put my books on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pan Char

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Nice purchase. Looks amazing in my living room, and can display numerous things with it now. Wasn't too hard to put together. The only problem I had was with shipping, a little bag with the screws and bolts to put it together was missing, and had to wait an additional two weeks to receive them. But hey, it happens. Overall I am very happy with the end product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: started to fall apart and didnt keep its shape to me cheaply held together
customer_reviews.author: kelly durham

customer_reviews.title: Decorative rather than book shelves
customer_reviews.text: Beutiful design and easy to assemble shelves. The problem is that it cannot be used solely as a book shelf. It does not support that much weight. After only two weeks the shelves started to bend and by now are very distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana Surev

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of stuff and a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: You put this together in parts - a little tricky, but directions are accurate - just need to pay attention to what pieces you need and what direction they need to go. Stated size is accurate. Holds a lot of stuff and a fantastic price...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: We have it in white. Will be purchasing more. Good, sturdy quality. Easy assembly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: cq

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice with old bottles in front of sliding door.
customer_reviews.author: mcf888

customer_reviews.title: but still a very nice product. A nice change to having normal bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: It bows at the top a little bit with the weight, but still a very nice product. A nice change to having normal bookshelves. The style of the shelves really make a difference in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Not stable. Danger of collapsing.
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable. It is slanted and shelves are bending. Nice design but Terrible quality. does not hold any kind of weight. We’ve had it for less than 6 month and we are already buying a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it looks. It is on the cheaper side so don't leave water on it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together and looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and looks wonderful. Different than just a normal bookcase/shelf. Using it to display son's Lego kits.
customer_reviews.author: Shefali Chheda

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The different heights are great for the things I wanted to display. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Weight issue
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a decent purchase. I like to look of the shelves. The issue I observed was that the top slab of wood started to warp downwards as books on the shelve. This caused me to remove the book and put them in storage. Hence the 3 stars. This is a bookshelves which cannot take the load of books. Sad but nowadays fine. Hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tej P Savant

customer_reviews.title: I'm worried the wood will break easy if I try to put my own hole through ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened it and put it together. Didn't take too long to assemble. Directions can be a little confusing.There were several scratches and dents on the shelfs... I can't fix the dents but I may be able to paint over the scratches. Since the shelf is supposed to be nailed against the wall there should be pre marked holes to do so. I'm worried the wood will break easy if I try to put my own hole through the shelf to attach to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so efficient. But there is a crack on one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Can't handle the weight of half of the books it has spots for. It is already bending and leaning from the weight of the books. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shelf! A lot bigger than expected. Took less than 45 minutes to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Payton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was easy to put together and definitely added a unique style to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kalon Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly what I expected and arrived when you said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was heavy, but this was very easy to put together by myself. I absolutely love the different sized shelves and the way it looks when filled. Highly recommend this for saving space and adding some sophisticated decor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Cool bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little tricky to put together but it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It went together very easily. I did it myself on the floor
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a little earlier..yah!..It went together very easily. I did it myself on the floor.....Husband helped pick it up and take to the other room.....Used hook to hold it to wall..it is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely hard and time consuming to put together if you do it alone. However, the price is good, and it simply looks AMAZING!! I use it for my school books , backpacks, and artifacts. The effort is worth the beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Xiwen Hu

product_meta.title: Mainstay Home 8-Shelf Bookcase (Espresso) (Espresso, 8-Shelf) (8-Shelf, Espresso)
product_meta.description: Size:8-Shelf| Color:EspressoAdd elegant function to a room with the Mainstays Home 8-Shelf Bookcase. It's a good option for any home. Use this versatile storage bookcase in the room of your choice, from living areas to bedrooms. It works well in any decor style, from contemporary to transitional. The finish coordinates easily with a wide range of color palettes. With eight shelves, it's a simple way to provide a spot for books, accessories, electronics and more, even in the most space-conscious of rooms. Uniquely shaped construction offers an alternative to traditional shelving units. This Mainstays bookcase includes a safety secure to attach the shelf to a wall.
feature_bullets: Designed to maximize storage in all the rooms of your home
Not recommended to place unit free standing in the middle of a room
Versatile unit matches all other furniture in the same finish
